headline: Bank of America Still Thinks Palantir Is One of the Best Stocks to Buy for 2026
summary: PLTR stock remains one of Bank of America’s highest-conviction ideas for 2026 as accelerating AI-driven growth and expanding margins reinforce its long-term platform thesis.

headline: Bank of America warns winter storm Fern could freeze Q1 growth
summary: After record snowfall and thousands of flight cancellations, BofA warns a "Viola" style economic chill is coming —though most of that growth is delayed, not destroyed

headline: BofA flags attractive compute valuations, highlights 4 key stocks
summary: Investing.com -- Bank of America said compute-focused chipmakers look increasingly attractive as valuations remain well below historical levels, even as artificial intelligence investment accelerates.

headline: Bank of America Corporation (BAC) Evaluates New Credit Cards With 10% Rate
summary: Bank of America Corporation (NYSE:BAC) is among the most profitable financial stocks to invest in. On January 22, Reuters reported that Bank of America Corporation (NYSE:BAC) is weighing options to introduce new credit cards offering a 10% interest rate to meet President Donald Trump’s demands, according to a source familiar with the matter. headline: Winter storm Fern seen having a ’substantial drag’ on U.S. Q1 growth
summary: Investing.com -- Winter storm Fern is likely to create a meaningful short-term hit to U.S. economic activity, with Bank of America estimating a 0.5–1.5 percentage point drag on first-quarter GDP growth.

headline: Don’t wait for Trump's 10% cap, Fed cuts — here's how to get a better credit card interest rate now
summary: President Trump has called for a 10% cap on credit card interest rates. What to know to get a lender's best rates sooner.

headline: Diversified Banks Stocks Q4 Recap: Benchmarking Bank of America (NYSE:BAC)
summary: Quarterly earnings results are a good time to check in on a company’s progress, especially compared to its peers in the same sector. Today we are looking at Bank of America (NYSE:BAC) and the best and worst performers in the diversified banks industry.
